saber.name: Knight's Blade
saber.description: Wield the fabled Dwsro blade, an ancient weapon that is said to be able to cut through the space-time continuum. Hitting an enemy will warp them to a faraway place.

dualSaber.name: Swordplay
dualSaber.description: Lunge with the Dwsro standard short-blade, dashing foward and slicing through enemies.

phaseOut.name: Ghost
phaseOut.description: Warp out of your current dimension, leaving your physical body behind, which you will continue to control. The 'ghost' will not be affected or harmed by any physical object. Warp back into your body after a set amount of time.

halo.name: Dagger
halo.description: Swing a dagger, dealing high damage.

armor.name: The Dwsro
armor.description: Choose the Dwsrso faction. Masters of the blade and lovers of art, the Dwsro are able to manipulate the battlefields and turn brutal, close-combat into a beautiful dance. Nicknamed the 'Blade Dancers,' carefully chain a combo to get in close and shred through your enemies.

empower.name: The Ganicor
empower.description: Choose the Ganicor faction. The Ganicor are supernatural, humaniod creatures designed to infect and kill. Instead of pure damage, these monsters focus on poison and lifesteal, dragging out battles. Stall until the enemy is forced into close-combat, where a quick combo of skills will finish them off.

boost.name: The Fakier
boost.description: Choose the Fakier faction. Armed with powerful tools to confuse and deceive your enemies, the Fakier trade health and attack for speed and maneuverability. In the hands of a true master, the Fakier can easily become the most deadly faction and lay waste to the battlefield.

bump.name: The Slingr
bump.description: Choose the Slingr faction. Old-fashioned maestros of ball and powder, equipped with both high knockback and high damage, sporting skills that allow you to both get in close or to keep your distance. Whether you are pushing or retreating, easily snipe down legions of enemies along the way.

decoy.name: Decoy
decoy.description: Detach yourself from the fabric of the world, and leave behind a decoy. Reappear moments after.

parry.name: Parry
parry.description: Hop backwards and throw a punch fowards, dodge and counter-attack at once.

mist.name: Deadly Mist
mist.description: A mist will emanate from you, marking enemies with Spores and catching enemy projectiles.

quickdraw.name: Quickdraw
quickdraw.description: Quickly fire a piercing bullet that will ricochet off solid surfaces

engage.name: Engage
engage.description: Sprint foward and run into the fray with guns blazing. For a short duration after dashing, your attacks will pack some extra punch.

empty.name: Fanning
empty.description: Utilize the technique of fanning-the-hammer and spray your enemies with bullets!

grenade.name: Grenade
grenade.description: Lob a small grenade that will sail over everything in it's path and will only hit your enemies, exploding after coming to a stop. Grenades will bounce off your enemy's bodies. If you hit an enemy with a physical grenade, explosion does not count, all of your skills will be refreshed.

cardTrick.name: Card Trick
cardTrick.description: Toss forward three cards. The cards will penetrate through enemies. Cards deal additional damage the closer you are to your enemy.

trap.name: Trap Card
trap.description: Demonstrate the signature Darc card throwing with a dazzling spiral-shaped toss. The card will explode upon contact, dealing damage and trapping enemies.

darkveil.name: Darc Veil
darkveil.description: Create a large area of smoke. Standing within your smoke will make you invisible.

darc.name: The Darc
darc.description: Choose the Darc faction. Sworn enemies of the Fakier, stories their rivalry are etched into the walls of the Chamber themselves. With more than a few tricks up their slevees, they have the power to put on quite a show, even against the masters of the Fakier. Close-ranged spells and high crowd-control abilities, these simply-dressed magicians have tricks that will truly stun their audience.

effects.title: The Darc
effects.text: Card Trick : Trap Card : Shuffle : Darc Veil

deck.name: Shuffle
deck.description: Fan out a deck of cards. The cards will penetrate through enemies. Cards deal additional damage the closer you are to your enemy.

mendingstation.name: Mending Station
mendingstation.description: Place down a turret that will emanate a green aura. You will regenerate health while standing in this healing aura.

damagebooster.name: Cosmic Rift
damagebooster.description: Tear open a rift along the ground and allow the magical energy to surge forward from within. Standing within the energy in increase your damage.

overgrowth.description: Plant life will burst around you, summoning small, organic blobs. Hitting enemies with these blobs will cause an explosion, then it will chain your enemy to you, forcing both of you into close-combat.
overgrowth.name: Overgrowth

warding.name: Spirit
warding.description: Summon a spirit that will haunt and circle nearby creatures. Will passthrough almost everything.

ritual.name: Apocalypse
ritual.description: Summon your true form and lay waste to the world. While in this form you will recieve a tremendous increase in all stats and become immune to death.

calvary.name: Purge
calvary.description: Summon the spirits to surge foward, purging the area in front of you from living things. Will passthrough almost everything.

bow.name: Nightmare Bow
bow.description: The sacred bow of the Eocrn; it steals the very life-force of anything its arrows hit. Will passthrough almost everything.

eocrn.name: The Eocrn
eocrn.description: Choose the Eocrn faction. Interdimensional mercenaries; their name is known across the galaxy. Dating back to the Old War, these swift assassins were orginally hired to establish peace in the Plains Of Lyte. But when the Old War ended, they too were captured and sealed away in the hopes of preventing future wars. Now, as the final race to become Awakened, these once proud assassins seek nothing but revenge against the ones they once called comrades.

effects.title: The Eocrn
effects.text: Arcane Bolt : Phase Step : Cosmic Rift : Comet Delivery

spore.description: Throw foward a small projectile that will mark enemies with Spores.
spore.name: Spores

plasma.name: Blaster
plasma.description: Fire a burst of blobs that will bounce off any surface.

toughen.name: Toughen
toughen.description: Engage your shields, greatly reducing incoming damage and knockback.

plasma2.name: Amped Blaster
plasma2.description: Fire a barrage of blobs that will bounce off any surface.

aasm.name: The Aasm
aasm.description: Choose the Aasm faction. One could hardly call them scientists, but there isn't a better word for them. Armed powerful weapons that take advantage of the battlefield itself, the chaos that the Aasm are able to create is second to none. Sporting continuous damage and knockback output, the Aasm excel in both sniping enemies from afar or engaging in close range duels.

effects.title: The Aasm
effects.text: Blaster : Toughen : Mending Station : Amped Blaster

infestation.name: Infestation
infestation.description: Release a cloud of spores, enemies hit will be marked with Spores.

slit.name: Retribution
slit.description: Repeatedly slash at the area in front of you.

weaken.name: Discipline
weaken.description: Jab forward with a blade of pure lightning. Enemies hit will do reduced damage for a while. Keep on hitting enemies to continuously lower their damage.

healingwind.name: Draining Gust
healingwind.description: A freezing whirlwind to slow your enemies. The whirlwind also catches enemy projectiles.

effects.title: Slow
effects.text: Enemies caught in your freezing breath will be slowed 50% for 2 seconds.

lash.name: Whip
lash.description: Hold the button down to brandish a whip of lightning that will fly forward and return to you after a certain amount of time. Release the button to make the whip to explode.

suppress.description: Pull your enemy towards you. The suppressed enemy will be silenced.

kunai.description: Throwing knifes, perfect for the silent kill. Hitting an enemy allows you to instantly throw another one.
kunai.name: Kunai

ruekeb.name: The Ruekeb
ruekeb.description: Choose the Ruekeb faction. An ancient race of noble warriors; the designated guardians of the Chamber before the Old War. They possess an uncanny control over lightning, being able to form or shape it into any weapon of their desire. One of the last races to be Awakened, these guardians now seek justice in a new, twisted form.

sniper.name: Crystalline
sniper.description: Fire a ball of ice that will grow in size and damage over time. Hitting an enemy will greatly reduce cooldown.

freezingbolts.name: Chilling Bolts
freezingbolts.description: Each bolt will add another stack freezing to your enemy. Keep on hitting your enemies to make them move slower and slower.

aura.name: Frost
aura.description: Freeze the air around you. Enemies that stand within your aura will take be slowed.

traps.name: Freezer
traps.description: Place down an ice trap that will quickly melt away. Enemies that walk into these traps will be frozen for a short duration.

hawth.name: The Hawth
hawth.description: Choose the Hawth faction. With the power of ice in their hands, these marksmen specialize in intense mid-ranged, sharpshooting action. With powerful slowing capabilities, even the most nimble enemies will fall prey to the Hawth's sniper shots.

grasp.name: Flying Cables
grasp.description: Fire out a cable to latch onto obstacles. Hitting an enemy will refresh Whirlwind, but cables will not latch onto enemies.

spin.name: Whirlwind
spin.description: Swing your blade in a tight circle around you, dealing low damage.

hologram.name: Backtrack
hologram.description: Track your position, leaving behind a hologram. You will teleport back to this hologram after a while.

finisher.name: Cut Throat
finisher.description: Leap in the direction of the nearest enemy. If you come into contact with the enemy, they will take huge damage and Sprint will be refreshed.

sprint.name: Sprint
sprint.description: Gain a small burst of movement speed and the ability to move through obstacles.

hook.name: The Hkoo
hook.description: Choose the Hkoo faction. Once peasants of the Aco Valley, the war and corruption of the Old War spilled beyond the borders of the Plains of Lyte. Without any means of defense, these poor farmers were torn by the war. It is said that the mysterious Master of Arms came upon this destroyed village by accident, but nevertheless rushed to their aid, rebuilding them into fearsome, flying, killing cyborgs from the scraps. The Master of Arms was never heard from again.

effects.title: The Hkoo
effects.text: Whirlwind : Flying Cables : Sprint : Cut Throat

comet.name: Comet Delivery
comet.description: Hurl a comet at your closest enemy, exploding and dealing damage. Everytime you hit an enemy with another skill, this skill will be refreshed.

arcane.name: Arcane Bolt
arcane.description: Gather energy and unleash a small ball of pure magic.

step.name: Phase Step
step.description: Dash forwards while throwing an Arcane Bolt at the nearest enemy.
